text: Subhadram is a 2007 Indian Malayalam-language film, directed by Sreelal Devaraj, starring Jayakrishnan, Padmakumar and Mythili Royin the lead roles. The film was dubbed into Tamil as Androru Naal with additional scenes featuring Tamil actors and it was released in 2010. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Suraj Venjaramoodu * Rajan P. Dev * Bindu Panicker * Jayakrishnan * Padmakumar * Mythili Roy * Riyaz Khan * Veena Thilak * Binda ==References== ==External links== Category:2007 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Subhadram
